about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
As the sun rises and the clouds expand across the inner coastal waters you will feel an immediate invigorated sense of self. The ripples slowly push towards you as the sky fills with gorgeous morning colors. Moving to the next experience, gaze at the beautiful surroundings as the sun reaches through the trees onto the reflection pond you are wading in. This immersions ending retreat lands you perched in a bed of trees at the tip of the ocean.

Purpose
Relaxation
Self reflection
Self meditation

Length
10:24

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
